Title: Good Intentions
Plot: Redding discovers that Busmalis lied about DeSantos. Furious, he confronts Morales and the confrontation gets the two of them thrown in the hole. Cyril gets convicted of the murder and Ryan tells the attorney not to appeal. Meanwhile Sister Pete, Father Meehan and Suzanne Fitzgerald meet to devise another plan in Cyril's defense. Rebadow fumes over not getting the lottery money. Mc Manus' offer to search Oz's databases reveals an inmate with the same blood history as Rebadow's grandson. Rebadow
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, nudity, sex scenes & offensive language.
GuestStars: Sandra Purpuro, Malachy McCourt, Pepa, Toni Lewis, Michael Gregory Gong, Roy Thinnes, Aasif Mandvi, Joyce Van Patten, Emanuel Yarbrough, Andy Powers, Marcus Maurice, Ben Vereen, Mike Doyle, Joel West
